channel.title: Russ Hiebert
channel.description: Recent news about Russ Hiebert, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Peace Arch News
item.description:
Take a side on coal trains
For five weeks I have been asking MP Russ Hiebert to tell me what his position is on the coal-train issue. It is an issue of great importance. The increase to coal-train traffic will be costly. The economic benefit to a handful of jobs at the port does not justify the ...

item.title: Mentioned by Peace Arch News
item.description:
MP welcomes bill's second chance
Hiebert-Russ0411FC.jpg. South Surrey-White Rock-Cloverdale Conservative MP Russ Hiebert said he hopes the Senate will give appropriate consideration to his private members bill requiring labour unions to publish detailed financial information. File photo.

item.title: Mentioned by Edmonton Journal
item.description:
Complaint spurs review of poll cited in union disclosure fight
Apoll used by B.C. Conservative MP Russ Hiebert to argue there is wide public support for his controversial union disclosure bill is the subject of a disciplinary review by the organization that sets polling standards, The Vancouver Sun has learned. The 2011 ...

item.title: Mentioned by Peace Arch News
item.description:
Poll cited by MP Hiebert challenged
An opinion poll cited repeatedly by MP Russ Hiebert as evidence of strong support for his union financial disclosure bill is the subject of a complaint to the agency that sets the standards for such research. Canadian Labour Congress president Ken Georgetti ...

item.title: Mentioned by Edmonton Journal
item.description:
Poll cited by Tory MP in union disclosure fight under review by polling standards ...
OTTAWA — A poll used by B.C. Conservative MP Russ Hiebert to argue there is wide public support for his controversial union disclosure bill is the subject of a disciplinary review by the organization that sets polling standards, The Vancouver Sun has ...

item.title: Mentioned by Surrey Leader
item.description:
Pride proponent not proud of Surrey MP
... participant belts out a song during the 2011 celebration in Holland Park. A letter writer contrasts the celebratory Pride events taking place throughout Canada this summer with MP Russ Hiebert's response to the issue of same-sex marriage. Leader file photo.
